I: I'm sorry if this is chat is not for this type of inquiry, but I was just trying to get an opinion on whether or not it's worth it to upgrade from Hardy to Intrepid.

depends on what you need. If everything is working fine for you on hardy, and you don't need any newer apps, i'd say don't bother upgrading. If you're having hardware compatibility problems, or need newer software, try intrepid.
also note that Hardy is a Long Term Support release and Intrepid isn't, so if you care about that sort of thing, stick with Hardy.
